\newcommand{\yourQuote}{``Are we recording? Is this thing on?''}
\newcommand{\yourAuthor}{George Washington}

\begin{center}

\vspace*{\fill}
\yourQuote\\
\textit{\yourAuthor}
\vspace*{\fill}

\end{center}
\end{titlepage}
